channel.title: Atonement RSPS "Revolutionizing Your RSPS Experience!"
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/3313ebd.jpg[/img]
I've moved this advertisement thread over to the development section because of its closure and continuation of development to make it the best possible server we can make it; and so that you, the community, can hopefully keep up with our work more efficiently. We're planning on releasing a beta phase once we're comfortable with where the server is at. Our forums will be up shortly and beta will be released not long afterwards so be on the lookout. If you'd like to apply for the Atonement Development Team then please do so via our recruitment topic @: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=665960.msg4452195#msg4452195
[s]Website Client Download[/s]
[spoiler=What we stand for] Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can't wait to initiate this perpetual experience. [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Features] - 24-7 online - No lag - Helpful friendly community - Dedicated Development Team - Tons of OSRS items - Professionally developed interfaces and timers - Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters - Clean, organized, easy to maneuver environment - 12 custom pets - Fully functional clan chat system - Instant PK by clicking stats to level, or trainer starter - Advanced account security system - Tons of unique and useful shops - Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching - Unique title system available to all players - 21 fully trainable skills - Free points system - Custom animations - Killstreak system - Slayer points with shop - PVP target system with points and shop - PK point system with shop - Challenge point system with shop - God system -Choose your alliance either with Zamorak or Saradomin -Gain reputation points by killing followers of the rival god. -Reputation points then can be used for combat advantages as the gods bless you in battle! - Tons of helpful commands - Clean tabs with useful information - OSRS bosses and monsters - Full Pest Control with points shop - Dark Crab fishing - Full fight caves - Full barrows - Full Warrior's Guild - Donation Point System with shop - Clean Website - Voting system with rewards -Points and shop - Strong Economy - In-game highscores - Fun-PK - Clean, functional orbs - Daily updates - Growing Community - Oldschool feeling - And much more! Come check it out for yourself! [/spoiler]
[spoiler=In-Game Media] Client Background (Credits to our Head Developer Ajax aka Dillon) [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/3469egy.jpg[/img] Old School Runescape Items! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2j4abet.jpg[/img] Clean Timers And Experience Counter! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2hmnep5.jpg[/img] Many Useful Teleports! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/dvolc0.jpg[/img] Clean, Easy To Maneuver Environment! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/avlr4k.jpg[/img] 12 Custom Pets! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2u7vjf8.jpg[/img] Fully Functional Clan Chat System [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2afwk7r.jpg[/img] Instant Leveling Or Train To Level! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/346tape.jpg[/img] Advanced Account Security System! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/nx81vm.jpg[/img] Some Of Our Amazing Shops! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/jhwmyb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/dmryvq.jpg[/img] Awesome Combat System With Timers, Special Attacks, And Flawless Switching! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/zjyv13.jpg[/img] Custom Title System For All Players To Enjoy! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/18jg9j.jpg[/img] 21 Fully Trainable Skills! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2954e0y.jpg[/img] Unique Animations! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ak9rpz.jpg[/img] Many Unique PVP Systems With Points And Rewards! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/73jvat.jpg[/img] Choose Which God To Worship And Kill Those Who Worship Otherwise For Blessings In Combat! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29m6hlj.jpg[/img] Tons Of Helpful Commands! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6em0bo.jpg[/img] Clean Player Tabs! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/27x08eq.jpg[/img] OSRS Bosses! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/mmr09w.jpg[/img] Full Pest Control! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/wjipy.jpg[/img] Dark Crab Fishing! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/mb7qeq.jpg[/img] Full Fight Caves! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/a44mfc.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Atonement RSPS "Revolutionizing Your RSPS Experience!"
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

This server looks amazing, looking forward to future updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Atonement RSPS "Revolutionizing Your RSPS Experience!"
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:547606”][quote author=D3i7y link=topic=666515.msg4456293#msg4456293 date=1415101718]

OH MY GOD, why are these posts always 100x better then the ones in advertisement?

because there’s a difference between a tutorilist and a programmer.
[/quote]

[hr]

Good luck nolan[/quote]

Thanks, bud. I want you to stop in sometime when it’s opened and hangout.

Quick Media Update

We’ve implemented a spectral dust system into the barrows mini-game (Spectral dust located third down from the left inventory column). This system works with a randomized value between 1-14 spectral dust received upon opening the barrows chest, along with the reward. Once you’ve received 250 spectral dust and you have a complete barrows set (Ahrims, Dharoks, Torags, Veracs, or Karils) then you’ll be able to use the 250 spectral dust on the set and receive the junior version of that particular pet (Located in the top left hand corner of the inventory.) We’re hoping this will make barrows more valuable and give the community some incentive to actually play mini-games. Refer to the text in the dialogue box for a further idea of how it works.

I know how this community feels about custom items, believe me I share the same opinion and deeply rooted hatred for them, but this next update I would not consider it as much of a custom, more so than an esthetic buff similar to that of a fury ornament kit or infinity kit. We’ve implemented a golden godsword kit purely for the sake of esthetics to revamp the looks of each sword. The stats will remain the same but the kit is going to be obtainable through clue scrolls and some sort of crystal key chest at a very rare drop rate. The kit will be trade-able, along with the sword. You’ll be able to melt the gold off of the sword at any near by furnace if you wish to be rid of it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Exion:

Look’s great, I’d definitely play this.

Right on, bud. You’ll get your chance. It’s undergoing heavy reconstruction that will be evident in future pictures that I think everyone is going to really enjoy. There will be so much unique content. Keep up with the thread for a release date between now and Thanksgiving

artem543:

looks amazing. hit me up when you’ll host it. I’ll take a look at it.

For sure, man. I’ll let everyone know on the thread and those who’ve requested through PM.

@nolan2131 wrote:

I’ve moved this advertisement thread over to the development section because of its closure and continuation of development to make it the best possible server we can make it; and so that you, the community, can hopefully keep up with our work more efficiently. We’re planning on releasing a beta phase once we’re comfortable with where the server is at. Our forums will be up shortly and beta will be released not long afterwards so be on the lookout. If you’d like to apply for the Atonement Development Team then please do so via our recruitment topic @: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=665960.msg4452195#msg4452195

Website

[spoiler=What we stand for]
Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can’t wait to initiate this perpetual experience.
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Features]

  • 24-7 online
  • No lag
  • Helpful friendly community
  • Dedicated Development Team
  • Tons of OSRS items
  • Professionally developed interfaces and timers
  • Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters
  • Clean, organized, easy to maneuver environment
  • 12 custom pets
  • Fully functional clan chat system
  • Instant PK by clicking stats to level, or trainer starter
  • Advanced account security system
  • Tons of unique and useful shops
  • Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching
  • Unique title system available to all players
  • 21 fully trainable skills
  • Free points system
  • Custom animations
  • Killstreak system
  • Slayer points with shop
  • PVP target system with points and shop
  • PK point system with shop
  • Challenge point system with shop
  • God system
    -Choose your alliance either with Zamorak or Saradomin
    -Gain reputation points by killing followers of the rival god.
    -Reputation points then can be used for combat advantages as the gods bless you in battle!
  • Tons of helpful commands
  • Clean tabs with useful information
  • OSRS bosses and monsters
  • Full Pest Control with points shop
  • Dark Crab fishing
  • Full fight caves
  • Full barrows
  • Full Warrior’s Guild
  • Donation Point System with shop
  • Clean Website
  • Voting system with rewards
    -Points and shop
  • Strong Economy
  • In-game highscores
  • Fun-PK
  • Clean, functional orbs
  • Daily updates
  • Growing Community
  • Oldschool feeling
  • And much more! Come check it out for yourself!
    [/spoiler]
